title: Instant PotÂ® egg shakshuka with kale
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 onion, diced', '1/2 red pepper, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '60g kale leaves', '350g passata or tomato pasta sauce', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 eggs', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
